activation.reactionTrigger: Lose one or more psi dice from your reservoir

system.description:
You have begun to learn to use your psionics and magic as a unified whole. You gain the following benefits:

  • While you are psionically-focused, you have a firmer grasp on your magic. When you roll a 1 on a damage die with one of your spells while psionically-focused, you can reroll that die. You must use the new result.
  • Your lost psionic energy can be rapidly repurposed into magical energy. When you lose one or more psi dice from your reservoir, you can use your reaction to cast a cantrip, 1st- or 2nd- level spell of the psychic or psionic school without using a spell slot. Once you have used this benefit a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.
  • You have resistance to psychic damage.
  • Half your esper levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.nzb62jeh28fulijh]{Wizard’s Flair} feature
  • Half your wizard levels count as esper levels for the purpose of the Psychic Crush feature.
